therestaurant.title: The Restaurant Luce e Limoni
therestaurant.content: Luce e Limoni is the symbolic return of owner Fabrizio Zafarana to his home, Sicily. It is the materialisation of a concept woven with beauty, local Sicilian cuisine and good taste. In a way, it is the repossession of Fabrizio’s roots.

ourfood.title: Our Food at Luce e Limoni
ourfood.metadescription: The menu is embracing the native approach to food – take the best ingredients, allow that quality to shine through and present them with as little fuss as possible.
ourfood.content:
The menu is embracing the native approach to food – take the best ingredients, allow that quality to shine through and present them with as little fuss as possible.

Our food is the story of a long trip which changes over time, but with one common point: the tradition. In Sicily, trade brought hundreds of years of foreign influence, which we try to bring in our restaurant by offering revisited traditional dishes giving fresh sensations to our customers.

aperitifs.title: Aperitifs at Luce e Limoni
aperitifs.metadescription: Enjoy a relaxing pre-dinner aperitif… to “open” the palate and stimulate the appetite.
aperitifs.content:

starters.title: Starters from Luce e Limoni
starters.content:
Starters

  
Fritto misto di mare con maionese alla bottarga   £10.50
Deep-fried mixed seafood with bottarga mayonnaise
Carpaccio di gambero marinato al gin e polline di finocchio con fragole fresche   £11.50
Prawns carpaccio marinated with gin and fennel pollen, served with fresh strawberries
Prosciutto di tonno con carciofi trifolati e olive   £10.95
Wind dried tuna prosciutto with artichokes and olives
Cappesante scottate in padella con crema di cavolfiore stufato e acciughe   £10.95
Seared kings scallops with cream of cauliflower and anchovies
Macco di fave con calamaretti saltati   £6.95
Traditional Sicilian dried broad beans soup with spicy squid
Burrata con caponata siciliana   £9.95
Creamy mozzarella cheese with Sicilian caponata
Sformato di sgombro al forno con ricotta e capperi, silicornia in padella e salsa di peperone rosso arrosto   £9.50
Baked mackerel timbal with capers, ricotta, samphire and red pepper couli
Tortino di melanzane e casacavaddu fondente con pomodoro e foglie di menta   £9.50
Roast aubergine with melting pecorino cheese, tomato and mint leaves

pastaandrisotto.title: Pasta & Risotto from Luce e Limoni
pastaandrisotto.content:
Pasta & Risotto

  
Bucatini alle sarde con pomodori secchi, capperi, sultana e mollica tostata   £10.50
Bucatini with sardines, sun dried tomato, capers, sultanas and toasted breadcrumbs

  
Conchiglioni gratinati con granchio, zucchine e salsa di crostacei   £11.95
Large shell pasta gratin with crab, courgette and shellfish sauce

  
Rigatoni con melanzane, pomodoro, basilico e ricotta salata   £9.95
Rigatoni with aubergine, tomato, basil and salty ricotta cheese

  
Spaghetti all’aragosta con sesamo tostato, brandy e pomodorini ciliegia   £15.95
Half lobster spaghetti with toasted sesame seeds, brandy and cherry tomatoes

  
Gnocchi di zucca gialla con salsa di pistacchio di bronte ed erba cipolina   £10.50
Pumpkin gnocchi with pistachio sauce and spring onion

  
Ravioli di basilico con ricotta e polpa di ricci in brodino di mare   £10.95
Basil ravioli with sea urchin and ricotta cheese

  
Tagliatelle al cacao con ragú di lepre e foglie di timo limonato   £10.95
Cocoa tagliatelle with hare ragout and fresh lemon thyme

  
Risotto allo zafferano con cernia, fave e scaglie di piacentino   £10.95
Saffron risotto with grouper fillet, broad beans and sicilian pecorino

  
Linguine al nero di seppia con ragú di triglia e olive   £11.50
Cuttlefish ink linguine with red mullet ragout and olives

  
Tortelloni di salsiccia e patate con pomodoro, basilico e cime di rapa piccanti   £10.50
Sicilian sausage and potato tortelloni with tomato, basil and spicy sprouting broccoli

  
Stufato di mare piccante con cus cus al vapore £13.95 – £15.95
Stewed spicy seafood with tomato and steamed couscous

meatandfish.title: Meat & Fish from Luce e Limoni
meatandfish.content:
Meat & Fish

  
Porchetta alle erbe arrostita lentamente con lenticchie stufate e riduzione di Marsala   £14.95
Slowly roasted pork belly served with lentils and Marsala reduction

  
Nodino di vitello alla griglia con patate arrosto e spinaci   £17.50
Grilled T-bone veal served with roast potatoes and spinach

  
Scamone di agnello al forno marinato alla canella con datteri e scalogno caramellato e riduzione di vino rosso e rosmarino   £15.95
Roast rump of lamb with cinnamon, date and caramelised shallots with red wine jus and rosemary, with mashed potato

  
Coniglio arrosto ripieno con paté di funghi, puera di sedano rapa e fagiolini all'aglio   £14.50
Roasted rabbit legs stuffed with mushroom paté and wrapped in speck, with mashed celeriac and wilted french beans

  
Tonno grigliato con peperonata in agrodolce   £14.95
Grilled tuna steak with stewed red pepper and onions

  
Trancio di pesce spada in crosta di pane e pecorino con finocchi gratinati e salsa di pomodoro crudo   £14.50
Baked swordfish loin in bread crust, herbs and pecorino cheese,with spicy fresh tomato salsa and fennel gratin

  
Filetto di ricciola al cartoccio con gamberi, pomodorini, patate e dragoncello   £14.95
Roast amberjack fillet with prawns, cherry tomato, potato and tarragon leaves in papillate

  
Pagello arrosto con insalata di arance e menta   £14.95
Roast whole sea bream with orange and fresh mint salad

reservations.title: Reservations at Luce e Limoni
reservations.content: <!-- widget --> <iframe id="iframePreview" style="border:0; height:425px; position:relative; width:674px" src="http://www.toptable.co.uk/frontdoor/singlerest.aspx?rid=98565&restref=98565&bgcolor=000000&titlecolor=B97F36&subtitlecolor=FFFFFF&btnbgimage=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.toptable.co.uk%2Ffrontdoor%2Fimg%2Fot_btn_black.png&otlink=FFFFFF&icon=light&mode=short&hover=1&code=&rnm=Luce+e+Limoni+(98565)%2C+London&lang=&c=UK&aid=57206"></iframe> <!-- widget end -->

Reservation


Tel: 020 7242 3382

We only accept online bookings for tables up to 6 guests. For table of 7 or more please call the restaurant.

We are able to accommodate larger parties for lunch or dinner by prior arrangement, but we may have to offer a reduced version of the menu. Please call in advance to discuss your requirements.

For tables of 7 or more we require credit card details upon booking. We reserve the right to charge a cancellation fee of £25 per person in the event of a no-show or if the cancellation is made after 12pm the same day. If we are able to re-sell the table on the same terms, no cancellation charge is made.

Private Hire


We can stage many parties and events where guests can hire the entire restaurant or only part of it for special occasions; anything from a birthday, wedding or anniversary to a corporate event. Please contact us for details.

Corkage is charged at £15 a bottle.

reviews.title: Reviews of Luce e Limoni
reviews.content:
Reviews


Checkout our reviews on tripadvisor.co.uk...

“ Luce e Limoni - a slice of Sicily on Gray's Inn Road ”. Barbican Life article...
Lawrence Williams, Barbican Life.

“ An amazing food experience, genuinely great tasting dishes served exquisitely. Will return to this jewel part of London ”.
Mr. Leigh L.

“ Was ravenously hungry, but what a splendid way to fill one self with the a little taste of Sicily. Could be pasta made from heaven! ”.
Miss Emma G.

contactus.title: Contact Luce e Limoni
contactus.content:
Contact Us


91-93 Gray’s Inn Road,
London WC1X 8TX
Tel: 02072423382

Opening Times:


Lunch:
Mon-Sat 12pm-3pm

Dinner:
Mon-Thu 6pm-10pm
Fri-Sat 6pm-11pm

Careers


For a career opportunity at Luce e Limoni please email flavours@luceelimoni.com

Gift Vouchers


If you’re stuck for a personal gift or business reward ideas, our Gift Vouchers are perfect for those who deserve something special. Contact the restaurant for more details.
